TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1148-1149
TEI.2.document_author: Robert Lewis, Stephen F Austin, Jose Antonio Saucedo
TEI.2.document_title: Robert Lewis, Stephen F Austin, Jose Antonio Saucedo to Stephen F Austin, 07-16-1825

document_location.sent_from: San Felipe de Austin, Bexar, Texas

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Robert Lewis, July 16, 1825. Bill and drafts.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1148-1149

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Robert Lewis, July 16, 1825. Bill and drafts.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Robt Lewis*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*S F Austin*/person_mentioned* Dr*/p*
*p*To League of Land exclusive of surveying____________________________165.00*/p*
*p*To Seal and paper on same______________________3.50*/p*
*p*To wagon and Mule____________________180.00*/p*
*p*348.50*/p*
*p*Cr. By account________________52.45*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Surveyor*/person_mentioned*s order 64.93*/p*
*p*equal in cash to ______________42.97 95.43*/p*
*p*Due in Cash_______253.07*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr Lewis*/person_mentioned* will pay the one half of the above to *person_mentioned*Jose Antonio Saucedo*/person_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned*and the other half to the *person_mentioned*Baron de Bastrop*/person_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*— *person_mentioned*Saucedo */person_mentioned*may be paid in goods—the *person_mentioned*Baron */person_mentioned*must be paid Cash*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-16-1825">July 16. 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[On back] Recd of *person_mentioned*Robert Lewis*/person_mentioned* One Hundred and twenty six Dollars and [53 1/2] cts the amount of my proportion of the within Acct. this *date_mentioned n="08-22-1825">22d August 1825*/date_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*Recibi del Sor *person_mentioned*Roberto Lewis*/person_mentioned* los ciento veinte y seis pesos sincuenta y tres y medio sueldos que me entrego por cuenta del *person_mentioned*Coronel Esteban Austin*/person_mentioned*. *location_mentioned*Bejar */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-23-1825">23 de Sepe, de 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*José Ant°. Saucedo */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*Son 126 ps. 53 1/2 sueldos*/p*
*/div1*
